divs: Sighting Detailsi was elk hunting completely clean and sober. i was sitting on this huge flat rock looking down to the oak brush all of a sudden i could not breathe! after a second or two ilooked up over my right shoulder and saw a boomerang like thing.and it stopped the second i looked up i watched it for certain amount of time. the next thing i know it zoomed of at an incrediable speed.It went down to the oak brush and saw it hit the leaves and dissapear.I could finally breathe! I stood up and just walked away like nothing when hunting season was over I never even thought about it. a few mounths ago I remembered it and talked about it I was heckled and had my family turned away from me. i finally got my first pc and reported it
trends: There has been one other sighting in Meeker
There were no other sightings in Meeker on or around October 17th 1983
Summary: i saw a boomerang shaped object it made all the oxyigen away i couldnbreathet
